entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 2:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain late this evening then to light snow before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
